description: A dark-themed, futuristic, and vibrant UI design system with a focus on data visualization and cryptocurrency-related information. The style is characterized by glowing neon accents, clean lines, and a structured, container-based layout.

primary.name: primary-background
primary.description: Deep purple, used as the main background color.

secondary.name: container-background
secondary.description: A slightly lighter purple for container backgrounds and panels.

accent.name: vibrant-purple
accent.description: A bright, glowing purple for highlights, borders, and important UI elements.

accent-secondary.name: bright-cyan
accent-secondary.description: A vivid cyan for accents, data visualizations, and highlights.

accent-tertiary.name: hot-pink
accent-tertiary.description: A vibrant pink used for accents and corner details on containers.

text.name: primary-text
text.description: White for primary text and headings.

text-secondary.name: secondary-text
text-secondary.description: A light grey for subheadings and less important text.

typography.fontFamily: Sans-Serif, preferably a modern, geometric font like 'Poppins' or 'Montserrat'

layout.gridSystem: A flexible grid system, likely based on a 12-column layout.

main-container.name: main-card
main-container.description: The primary container for content sections, featuring a dark background, rounded corners, and glowing borders.

corner-accents.name: card-corner-flair
corner-accents.description: Small, decorative elements at the corners of the main containers.

info-banner.name: highlight-bar
info-banner.description: A banner used for displaying key information, such as the total supply of a token.

label-chip.name: info-tag
label-chip.description: A small tag or chip often attached to the info banner for additional context.

pie-chart.name: data-donut-chart
pie-chart.description: A circular chart for visualizing data distribution.

line-graph-breakdown.name: distribution-line-plot
line-graph-breakdown.description: A horizontal line graph used to show a breakdown of percentages.

tax-info-bar.name: summary-bar
tax-info-bar.description: A horizontal bar at the bottom of the layout for summarizing key metrics or taxes.

data-point.name: summary-data-item
data-point.description: Individual data points within the tax info bar.

character-illustration.name: mascot-artwork
character-illustration.description: A stylized character illustration used as a mascot or decorative element.

style.artStyle: Cartoonish with bold outlines and vibrant colors that match the UI palette.
style.effects: Subtle drop shadow to make it stand out from the background.

background-texture.name: subtle-noise-background
background-texture.description: A subtle texture applied to the main background to add depth.
background-texture.style: A faint, dark noise or static pattern.
